alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 9:35AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mississippi, western Pemiscot, southeastern Dunklin and northwestern Lauderdale Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 935 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arbyrd to Manila to near Dyess. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Kennett, Osceola, Gosnell, Manila, Steele, Leachville, Senath, Luxora, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Cooter, Dyess, Dell, Burdette, Bassett and Marie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
